name: Desire
synopsis: In the southern ocean on a remote island there is a huge research institute called "Desire". An institute built by the large, world renowned financial group "Grandchester Foundation". It's rumored they are involved in a military-related research, but what it is exactly is kept a carefully guarded secret. For this reason, a journalist for SNT (Social News Time Network), Albert Macdgul visits "Desire" in order to collect information for his story. He's one of the rare few who have been granted access to "Desire" where he meets a girl named Tina, who is suffering from memory loss. Murder, bomb threats, mysteries shadowing her existence and she is destined to change his fate forever.
